name: Kanbanflow Clean
description:
Love Kanbanflow but turned off by the design? It's 2021 and Kanbanflow is still the most powerful Kanban tool around. With the swimlanes, effective color coding, sorting, time estimates and other features you can easily enable or disable, Kanbanflow is no doubt a project management powerhouse for solo freelancers and large teams. If you think the design is outdated, don't fret. Minor adjustments have been made to make it easy on the eyes:
  • Complete Kanbanflow overhaul with cleaner design
  • Custom Google Font
  • Soft Shadows
  • Softer Colors
  • Breathable (Wider Spaces)
